less likely that He would consider the circumstances suitable for conferring
a soul. The circumstances in question are discussed in the rest of this paper.
In  attempting  to  construct  such  machines  we  should  not  be  irreverently
usurping His power of creating souls, any more than we are in the procre-
ation of children: rather we are, in either case, instruments of His will pro-
